title: Hanging, "Binary Traces: Kay", 2005
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: two intercrossed plain weave structures (double cloth), hand woven using digitally manipulated jacquard head
provenance: Purchased from the artist on the occasion of the exhibition Design Life Now: National Design Triennial 2006.
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Woven hanging in which a woman's face and hand, resembling an out-of-focus black and white photograph, fill the height and width.

exhibitions.title: Design Life Now: National Design Triennial 2006

2005. Medium: cotton
